body: I was wondering how someone could get the media rank as I have a channel that has Avicus on it so I was wondering how I could apply for that rank. Thanks :D
body_tagged: I was wondering how someone could get the media rank as I have a channel that has Avicus on it so I was wondering how I could apply for that rank. Thanks :D
title: Media Ranks

replies.body: No, the media rank is for people who will be streaming the Tourney.
replies.body_tagged: No, the media rank is for people who will be streaming the Tourney.

replies.body: The Media rank is for Livestreamers for the upcoming Omega Tournament, you had to apply but the applications are now closed.
replies.body_tagged: The Media rank is for Livestreamers for the upcoming Omega Tournament, you had to apply but the applications are now closed.

replies.body: As Alex said, they are obtained to those who will be streaming during the tourney. They look cool tho :[
replies.body_tagged: As Alex said, they are obtained to those who will be streaming during the tourney. They look cool tho :[

replies.body: Where will the livestreaming take place?
replies.body_tagged: Where will the livestreaming take place?

replies.body: Media is people that LiveStream to promote Avicus for the tournament also you don't just have to live stream you can record as well :)I think applications are closed correct me if I'm wrong :)
replies.body_tagged: Media is people that LiveStream to promote Avicus for the tournament also you don't just have to live stream you can record as well :)I think applications are closed correct me if I'm wrong :)

replies.body: I believe it will take place via Twitch.
replies.body_tagged: I believe it will take place via Twitch.

reply_to.body: Where will the livestreaming take place?
reply_to.body_tagged: Where will the livestreaming take place?

replies.body: Yes on twitch however ask a media person what their youtube or twitch name is or goto theirs profile link like avicus.net/ElementProHD some of it listed in their details. :)

reply_to.body: I believe it will take place via Twitch.
reply_to.body_tagged: I believe it will take place via Twitch.

replies.body: Media: users who will be promoting Avicus Events for external entertainment for both Youtube and Twitch audiences. (Just for an official answer)
